CaptureCancelConfirmed.description: A request for cancelling the remaining capturable amount has been confirmed

CaptureCancelFailed.description: A request for cancelling the remaining capturable amount was failed

CaptureCancelRequested.description: A request for cancelling the remaining capturable amount has been done

Chargedback.description: The transaction was charched back due to a dispute

DisputeResolved.description: The losses created by a Reversal or a Chargeback are booked

FraudCheckDenied.description: A request for a fraud check has been denied

FraudCheckPassed.description: A request for a fraud check has passed

FraudCheckRequested.description: A request for a fraud check has been issued, pending external verification

Reversed.description: The transaction was reversed by the psp
